title: The Incredible Week of Walter Davis, The Consulting Crusader
summary: A 73-year-old retired consultant, Walter Davis, uncovers a conspiracy that could endanger his city. He uses his expertise in consulting and public relations to expose the villains and save the community.
summaryGerman: Ein 73-jähriger pensionierter Berater, Walter Davis, entdeckt eine Verschwörung, die seine Stadt gefährden könnte. Er nutzt seine Erfahrung in Beratung und Öffentlichkeitsarbeit, um die Bösewichte zu entlarven und die Gemeinschaft zu retten.
summaryDutch: Een 73-jarige gepensioneerde consultant, Walter Davis, onthult een samenzwering die zijn stad in gevaar zou kunnen brengen. Hij gebruikt zijn expertise in consultatie en public relations om de schurken te ontmaskeren en de gemeenschap te redden.
summaryFrench: Un consultant retraité de 73 ans, Walter Davis, découvre un complot qui pourrait menacer sa ville. Il utilise son expertise en conseil et relations publiques pour exposer les méchants et sauver la communauté.

story.text: Walter, upon reading through old city council documents, stumbles upon inconsistencies that hint at corruption. This electrifies his curiosity and determination to investigate further.
After consulting with old contacts, Walter gathers more evidence. He feels a surge of energy as he connects the dots, realizing the depth of the corruption scheme.
Walter's efforts to publicize his findings hit a snag when his evidence is stolen. Though disheartened, he resolves not to give up, understanding the stakes.
Walter goes public at a community meeting, using only the information in his memory. His detailed account wins public support, emboldening his resolve.
With community backing, Walter presses on, uncovering crucial evidence that had been hidden by corrupt officials. The mood in the community is one of hopeful anticipation.
The police take action based on Walter's findings, leading to several arrests. Walter feels a profound sense of peace, watching justice being served.
The city honors Walter with a ceremony. Inspired, he speaks about the importance of vigilance and transparency in governance, leaving a lasting impact on all who listen.

ending: Thus, Walter Davis not only saved his city but also rekindled a spirit of accountability that the community had not felt for years.
moral: No matter the age, one's ability to make a significant difference should never be underestimated.
